item.title: Trump views foreign investment pledges as gifts. Trade partners say that's way off the mark
item.description: One question underpinning the foreign investment pledges at the center of several major Trump trade deals is how they might actually be enforced.

item.title: Trump says new semiconductor tariff plan coming as soon as next week
item.description: Trump's announcement on CNBC's "Squawk Box" came on the heels of him unveiling new tariff rates on numerous countries, with some facing steep hikes.
